articles.title: Janhvi Kapoor in a crop top and shorts returns to gym after celebrating Diwali - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Janhvi Kapoor stepped out in Mumbai today to visit her gym, dressed in a bright pink deep-neck crop top and black shorts. Janhvi scored a workout fashion win with her effortless and chic look.
